title: President Ghani: Appointing individuals by pressure is neither acceptable to me nor to the people ...
text: ( Source : Office of the President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan ) Mohammad Ashraf Ghani , President of the Islamic Republic of Afghanistan, spoke this morning via video teleconference from Tawheed Center in ARG with the governors,
